description:
RealWealth is looking for a Sponsorship Specialist to find and manage sponsors that support investor services (like lenders, attorneys, insurance, and other financial institutions). Additionally, this position will manage and acquire external sponsorships for our podcasts and social media channels.

Compensation: 25% - 30% Commission

Responsibilities:
• Create sponsorship proposals and pitch decks
• Identify and pursue potential sponsors after targeted research
• Work closely with the SFR Brokerage team to plan partner and sponsor acquisition strategy
• Manage the accounts of sponsors
• Point of contact between sponsors and RealWealth
• Effectively track and measure programs
• Monetization of social media accounts
• Monetization of podcasts

Qualifications:
• Strong background in sales and marketing
• Experience with sponsorship sales
• 3 years minimum in a commission-based sales position
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills
• Ability to track and report on the success of sponsorships
• Experience writing sponsorship proposals

About Company:
At RealWealth We help people create real wealth by "having the money and the freedom to live life on your terms".

It’s an incredibly rewarding purpose that our team is dedicated to fulfilling & built around the idea that everyone should be able to live life on their terms. We empower over 60,000 members around the world through financial intelligence and a simplified way to acquire income-producing real estate.

Guided by our six values, we meet these challenges as a team and with the support of our global network.
